title: Ethereum Cat Herder Meeting #52
body:
## Date and Time

Feb 16, 2021, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/87350675396?pwd=SEpiQ0ZHQ1NHL0RlQnNXVVNtRjAvZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

### 1. [Progress on ECH website](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/155)

### 2. EIP GitHub bot action 

### 3. New opportunities to contribute 

### 4. Events & community meetings
- ETHDenver 2021- [The Future In Ethereum 2021](https://twitter.com/hudsonjameson/status/1359165029074034688)
- [Ethereum 1559 Stakeholder’s call](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ethereum-1559-community-call-d43d5f0bf909)

### 5. Become an EIP Editor a draft submitted by Edson 

### 6. [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) 
- All Core Dev meeting #105
- [Eth2 Implementers' meeting #57](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-pm/blob/08b65f41c9c91985ecdc333934043441f8438013/eth2.0-implementers-calls/call_057.md)
- EIP Improvement Process meeting #26

### 7. [Peep an EIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F) 
-  [EIP-2266: Atomic Swap-based American Call Option Contract Standard with Guest: Runchao Han, Haoyu Lin](https://youtu.be/wwWcfl9N65k)
- [EIP-3076: Validator client interchange format (slashing protection) with  Michael Sproul, Sacha Saint-Leger](https://youtu.be/-z6OQNTAF7Y)

**Upcoming:**
- [EIP-2876: Deposit contract and address standard](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2876) with Jonathan Underwood on Feb 16, 2021 at 5:00 pm EST (Feb 17, 2021 at 7:00 am Japan Time)
- [EIP-2315: Simple Subroutines for the EVM](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2315) with Greg Colvin on Feb 24, 2021 at 1830 UTC (1:30 pm ET)

### 8. Discuss and close the ECH GitHub Issues/PRs
- [ethereum-cat-herders/PM](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues)
-  Transaction execution fees
- [ethereum-cat-herders/funding](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/funding/issues)

### 9. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 51](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20051.md)

#### The date for the next meeting - Mar 02, 2021

Just because there's a chance I miss the meeting tomorrow here's an update regarding the EIP bot. In short: things are going well, I have a direction and have made progress in translating the Python bot to Javascript (for use in Github Actions).

I have investigated and decided on using a custom Github action for this. Specifically, that means I'll be creating a custom actions plugin for the purpose of parseing EIPs. I have just finished converting the Python to Javascript, and next need to actually make it work (translated without testing / fixing errors).

Here's the fork of the EIPs repo that I've been using https://github.com/alita-moore/EIPs

notably, see .github/actions for the custom action plugin.

I intend on separating the above action and making it available on the actions marketplace once it has been developed fully. Though, this specifically is a minor detail.

Blockers:
- proper test PRs for development & testing
